function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Conducting an in-person questionnaire survey during the COVID-19 emergency period","Impact":"Potential exposure to COVID-19 due to direct contact during the survey","Mitigation":"Use of online surveys instead of in-person surveys to reduce direct contact and exposure risk","Technologies":"Online survey platforms, video conferencing tools","People":"Survey respondents, survey administrators, data collectors","Owner":"Research team, survey administrators"},{"Description":"High frequency of visits to green areas during the COVID-19 emergency period","Impact":"Increased risk of spreading contagious diseases due to frequent visits to public areas","Mitigation":"Promotion of social distancing, implementation of health and safety guidelines for outdoor activities, public awareness campaigns","Technologies":"Public health messaging, signage for social distancing, contact tracing apps","People":"General public, public health authorities","Owner":"Public health authorities, local government"},{"Description":"Use of high-resolution land use data for environmental context analysis","Impact":"Data security and privacy risks due to the use of detailed geographical information","Mitigation":"Anonymization of data, compliance with data protection regulations, secure data storage and access control","Technologies":"Data anonymization tools, encryption, secure database management systems","People":"Data analysts, researchers, survey administrators","Owner":"Research team, data administrators"}]}
